p: For the functional prediction, 26,219 unigenes were classified into 25 KOG categories. Among these, “General functional prediction only” (6420) was the largest group, followed by “Signal transduction mechanisms” (4527) and “Posttranslational modification, protein turnover, chaperones”, (2872) ( Supplement Figure S2). Furthermore, 9690 unigenes were annotated in 138 KEGG pathways. “Metabolic pathways” (4150) was the most represented pathway ( Supplement Figure S3).
